name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 10, Peking University professor Li Ling said in an interview with Phoenix Finance that the biggest difficulty in medical reform is to change the government. This is a huge redistribution of benefits, and no one dares to touch this high-voltage line. When we were making the medical reform plan, 800 billion yuan was enough to achieve free medical care for all. Now it is 9 trillion yuan, and you haven't even touched the hair. Too many people have received money that they don't deserve.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Peking University Li Ling's "China's Major Medical Issues" full version

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 11, Foshan, Guangdong. China Construction Third Engineering Bureau owed workers wages. The workers went to the Labor Bureau for arbitration, but were told by the staff that they would not accept the case. The staff said, "We are dealing with disputes between enterprises and employees. If there are contractors among you, and the contractors invited you to come, don't waste time going through the arbitration process."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 10, NATO publicly condemned China's military support for Russia for the first time, accusing Beijing of becoming "a decisive promoter of Russia's war against Ukraine" and demanding that China stop sending "weapon parts" and other technologies that are critical to rebuilding the Russian army to Russia.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 11, Xiaojin County, Sichuan. On the way to Lugu Lake Scenic Area, flying rocks hit passengers on a bus. It is reported that one injured person has received treatment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 11, Zhongshan, Guangdong. Netizens posted a video saying that municipal vehicles had been discharging black sewage near Kangnian Road for two consecutive days without any announcement.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 11, Chongqing. Netizens posted a video saying that on the Chongqing-Zhuzhou Expressway, a police car repeatedly crossed the solid line to change lanes and pass other cars. According to reports, local police said they were carrying out their duties.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 11 (report), Shenzhen. A netizen posted on social media that a friend from another city came to Shenzhen to find a job and stayed at his home for a few days, but forgot to report to the landlord and was fined 500 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the owners of the unfinished buildings of the Guangdong Shenglong Guiyuan project issued a collective loan suspension notice to the Guangdong Financial Regulatory Bureau, the Huangpu District People's Government and Housing and Urban-Rural Development Bureau, and the Longhu Sub-district Office.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 12, due to the recent announcement by the United States of arms sales to Taiwan, the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs announced that it would take countermeasures against several US military companies and senior executives.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 9, Shanghai. Ms. Li was playing in a park in Songjiang District with her 4-and-a-half-year-old child. A man and a woman were walking their dog in the park. Because the dog was not properly leashed, the dog began to chase another child and Ms. Li's child. Later, the child's parents chased the dog away. When arguing with the man walking the dog, the man asked, "Why don't you tie up your child?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 4, a netizen left a message in the mailbox of the Director of Luoyang Education Bureau, saying that a principal surnamed Hu in Shuizhai Town, Yichuan County, had an improper relationship with a female teacher and had problems with the use of student funds. On July 8, the local authorities responded that a joint investigation team had been set up to investigate each item.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 10, Caixin reported that in the first half of the year, the national land transfer fee fell by 35% year-on-year, with Guangdong falling by 64% and the largest drop.
Huatai Securities research report shows that in the first half of 2024, the transaction area of residential land nationwide was about 180 million square meters, a year-on-year decrease of 35%; the transaction amount was about 669.4 billion yuan, a year-on-year decrease of 42%.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the article "Tsinghua Special Award teaches you how to use academic misconduct to embark on an academic path" has sparked discussion among netizens. The author of the article claims to be Shi Bochen, a doctoral student at Tsinghua University, who received his doctorate degree from the Department of Electrical Engineering and Applied Electronics Technology at Tsinghua University, a Shuimu Scholar at Tsinghua University, and the youngest young top talent in China's national talent program. He has a total of 8 first-author SCI papers, 5 of which tampered with experimental data, and 2 directly plagiarized and translated other people's papers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a netizen posted a post titled "A Shocking Moment in the M7" in which he claimed to be 50 years old and had been driving for 27 years. On July 6, while driving, the vehicle suddenly accelerated (estimated to accelerate from 50 km/h to 100 km/h). The post said that he stepped on the brakes hard, which was like "stepping on a stone" and there was no reaction at all. The vehicle lost control and crashed into a large truck, and the owner rolled and crawled out of the cab.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 9, Shenzhen, Guangdong. A man suddenly fell to the ground and convulsed at the gate of BYD factory.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 11, the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs responded to NATO's condemnation: NATO's content related to China is full of prejudice and smears. Wherever NATO's black hands extend, turmoil and chaos will appear. China's objective and fair position on the Ukrainian issue has been widely recognized by the international community.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 12, in Dongying, Shandong, administrative law enforcement officers prohibited tanker truck drivers from stopping at Bingang Road and Xinggang Road.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 11, a video showing that "people can enter the court to listen to the trial with their ID card" sparked doubts and ridicule from netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 11, it was reported that Taiwan's imported Japanese cooking oil was found to contain carcinogenic and genotoxic pollutants. However, some netizens found that the mainland has not yet approved the inspection of this indicator.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 11, Shaodong, Hunan. Mr. Ge posted a video saying that his son was engaged in concrete pouring. On the evening of June 23, he was working in Lihe Village when the mixer leaked electricity and he died on the spot. However, half a month has passed since the incident, and the local government has passed the buck to each other, and the compensation issue has not been resolved. The 16-year-old grandson in the family is in the first year of high school. Now that the pillar of the family is gone, life cannot continue. I implore the leaders to give the family of the deceased a result.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: U.S. Ambassador to China:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 11, Dingzhou, Hebei. Netizens posted a video saying that Dingzhou Wangzong Food Co., Ltd. injected water into live pigs. The video showed that the pigs howled in pain when they were injected with water.
As of now, the video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 12, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs made a statement regarding the arrest of an accomplice of the "Iron Head Peeing" incident in Japan: We hope that Chinese citizens will abide by local laws and regulations and express their demands rationally.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 11, Dingxi, Gansu. Villagers in Gulu Village reported that the town party secretary changed the disaster resettlement housing into commercial housing, requiring residents to pay extra to buy it, and the resettlement housing was also a shoddy construction. The residents were forcibly dragged into the police car and taken away when they tried to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 10, Linyi, Shandong. Zhongnan Junqi real estate project has not been delivered yet, and the owners gathered on the roof to protest their rights. "We can't live anymore."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 12, Shanghai. Victims of Haiyin Wealth went to the gate of the Economic Investigation Brigade of the Shanghai Public Security Bureau at No. 803, Zhongshan North 1st Road to defend their rights

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Shanghai authorities took the rights defenders to a place in Fengxian to restrict their personal freedom. During the period, an old woman fell into a coma and was sent to emergency by 120.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 10, Handan, Hebei. Villagers in Guokou Village, Quzhou County said that they had worked hard for a year and finally had a good harvest, but the merchants took the grain and ran away without paying. The villagers gathered at the Quzhou County Government to defend their rights, and the police snatched the banners from the villagers.
